title: CyaY and TusA regulate ISC- and SUF-mediated L-cysteine desulfurase activity

CyaY, the frataxin homolog of Escherichia coli, plays an important role in ISC iron-sulfur cluster assembly through interactions with the cysteine desulfurase IscS, which regulate the supply of sulfur. IscS...
